item.title: Saradomin And Armydyl Special Attacks
item.dc:creator: @tomjrmkay tomjrmkay
item.description:
@tomjrmkay wrote:

go to client.java and search

godsword

till you get to something that looks like this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount <= 49) {//zamgodsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 50) {//zamgodsword startAnimation(2890); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); stillgfx(284, absY, absX); stillgfx(285, absY, absX); stillgfx(284, absY, absX); stillgfx(285, absY, absX); stillgfx(283, absY, absX); stillgfx(283, absY, absX); sendMessage("Everything starts to burn around you!!"); specialDamage = 70 + misc.random(28); specialAmount -= 25; }
k then copy that and paste it under this.then change the ids and gfx to wat you want so should look something like this:

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount <= 49) {//saragodsword specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; sendMessage("You do not have enough special energy left."); } if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15335 && specialAmount >= 50) {//saragodsword startAnimation(2890); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); stillgfx(282, absY, absX); stillgfx(284, absY, absX); stillgfx(285, absY, absX); stillgfx(284, absY, absX); stillgfx(285, absY, absX); stillgfx(283, absY, absX); stillgfx(283, absY, absX); sendMessage("You kick butt with a sara sword!"); specialDamage = 30 + misc.random(10); specialAmount -= 50; }
the specialDamage = 30 + misc.random(10); the 30 is gaurenteed hit with spec and the (10) is you can hit 30 +10 so 40 max you can change and specialAmount -= 50; is how much energy it drains 25 is 4 specs 50 is 2 100 is 1
good luck

Read full topic
